title: Sahra Wagenknecht - Wikipedia
snippet: In mid-October, over 50 members of Die Linke submitted an application for Wagenknecht's exclusion from the party. The initiators said they wanted to prevent Sahra Wagenknecht from building a new party with the resources of Die Linke. "This is no longer acceptable," said Sofia Leonidakis, leader ...

title: Left Party | Germany, Politics, Origin, & Election Results | Britannica
snippet: Left Party, German political party that ruled East Germany as the Socialist Unity Party of Germany (SED) and now contests elections in united Germany as the Left (Die Linke).

title: How Die Linke Turned the Tide - Rosa-Luxemburg-Stiftung
snippet: Ines Schwerdtner and Jan van Aken have served as co-chairs of Die Linke since October 2024 and were both elected to parliament in the 2025 federal election.
